mean_cn: n.水桶；  v.颠簸行进；装在桶里
mean_en: an open container with a handle, used for carrying or holding liquids, sand, etc.; a large container that is part of a crane or digger and is used for lifting things; the amount contained in a bucket; a large amount
sentence: She pours a bucket of water on her head to cool off.
sentence_trans: 她往头上倒了一桶水，凉快一下。
